safety_class.CRITICAL: Physics/force/thermal calculations that directly affect machine safety, cutting forces, or thermal behavior
safety_class.HIGH: Optimization/toolpath algorithms that influence machine motion or cutting parameters
safety_class.MEDIUM: General manufacturing algorithms (search, scheduling, knowledge systems)
safety_class.LOW: Pure math/utility/infrastructure (graph theory, sorting, data structures)

integration_wave.1: CRITICAL safety_class - must integrate first with full validation
integration_wave.2: HIGH safety_class - integrate with manufacturing-context testing
integration_wave.3: MEDIUM safety_class - integrate with standard testing
integration_wave.4: LOW safety_class - integrate last, utility/support role

mfg_relevance.HIGH: Directly used in manufacturing calculations (cutting, forces, thermal, toolpath)
mfg_relevance.LOW: General purpose (pure math, graphics, data structures)

files.name: ALGORITHM_LIBRARY.js
files.description: Comprehensive toolpath algorithm library: morph spiral, trochoidal, adaptive clearing, rest machining, and finishing strategies. Core CAM toolpath generation.

files.name: COMPLETE_TOOLPATH_ALGORITHM_LIBRARY.js
files.description: Identical content to ALGORITHM_LIBRARY.js with const declaration added. Same morph spiral, trochoidal, adaptive clearing toolpath algorithms.

files.name: PRISM_ACO_SEQUENCER.js
files.description: Ant Colony Optimization for hole sequencing and operation ordering. Metaheuristic optimizer for CNC drilling sequence optimization (TSP-variant).

files.name: PRISM_ADVANCED_INTERPOLATION.js
files.description: Advanced interpolation methods for CNC motion: cubic spline, NURBS interpolation, and look-ahead algorithms for smooth toolpath execution.

files.name: PRISM_ALGORITHM_ENSEMBLER.js
files.description: Combines results from multiple algorithms using voting, averaging, or weighted strategies. Meta-algorithm for ensemble decision making.

files.name: PRISM_ALGORITHM_ORCHESTRATOR.js
files.description: Routes manufacturing problems to appropriate algorithms based on problem type classification (speed/feed, tool life, chatter, scheduling, path planning).

files.name: PRISM_ALGORITHM_REGISTRY.js
files.description: Central registry of 210+ algorithms organized by category (optimization, graph, signal, manufacturing, ML). Metadata catalog with gateway references.

files.name: PRISM_ALGORITHM_STRATEGIES.js
files.description: 25 toolpath strategy definitions: Voronoi adaptive clearing, medial axis roughing, trochoidal strategies. Strategy selection for CAM operations.

files.name: PRISM_BEZIER_MIT.js
files.description: Bezier curve evaluation and manipulation algorithms. De Casteljau subdivision, degree elevation, point-on-curve evaluation.

files.name: PRISM_CONTROL_SYSTEMS_MIT.js
files.description: PID controller implementation, Ziegler-Nichols tuning, transfer function analysis. Direct machine control algorithm for CNC servo loops.

files.name: PRISM_CORE_ALGORITHMS.js
files.description: Core data structures (priority queue, binary heap) and foundational algorithms from MIT 6.006/18.086. Infrastructure for other algorithm modules.

files.name: PRISM_CRITICAL_ALGORITHM_INTEGRATION.js
files.description: Integration glue module that registers critical algorithms (Voronoi, Interior Point, Spectral) with global window scope. Wiring/bootstrap code.

files.name: PRISM_DFM_MIT.js
files.description: Design for Manufacturability analysis algorithms. Evaluates part designs for manufacturing feasibility, wall thickness, draft angles, etc.

files.name: PRISM_DIGITAL_CONTROL_MIT.js
files.description: Digital control theory: Z-transform analysis, discrete-time controllers, digital filter design for CNC machine control systems.

files.name: PRISM_DS_SEARCH.js
files.description: Knowledge base search interface across data structures, algorithms, systems, and manufacturing KBs. Lookup/retrieval utility.

files.name: PRISM_FFT_PREDICTIVE_CHATTER.js
files.description: FFT-based chatter prediction using vibration signal analysis combined with stability lobe diagrams. Real-time spindle vibration monitoring for proactive chatter avoidance.

files.name: PRISM_GRAPH.js
files.description: Core graph algorithms: Dijkstra shortest path, BFS, DFS, topological sort. General-purpose graph traversal and shortest path computation.

files.name: PRISM_GRAPHICS.js
files.description: 3D graphics transformation matrices, projection, viewport calculations. Rendering pipeline utilities for CAD visualization.

files.name: PRISM_GRAPHICS_KERNEL_PASS.js
files.description: BVH (Bounding Volume Hierarchy) construction with SAH (Surface Area Heuristic). Spatial acceleration structure for ray tracing / collision in graphics kernel.

files.name: PRISM_GRAPHICS_MIT.js
files.description: MIT-sourced computer graphics algorithms: rasterization, clipping, shading models. Academic graphics pipeline implementation.

files.name: PRISM_GRAPH_ALGORITHMS.js
files.description: Graph algorithms with explicit CAM applications: Dijkstra for rapid move minimization, MST for tool grouping. Overlaps with PRISM_GRAPH.js but adds manufacturing context.

files.name: PRISM_GRAPH_TOOLPATH.js
files.description: Graph neural network for learning optimal CNC toolpath structures. Converts toolpath to graph representation with feed rate, curvature features for GNN-based optimization.

files.name: PRISM_JACOBIAN_ENGINE.js
files.description: Jacobian matrix computation and singularity analysis for multi-axis CNC kinematics. Maps joint velocities to end-effector velocities (forward kinematics via DH parameters).

files.name: PRISM_JOHNSON_COOK_DATABASE.js
files.description: Johnson-Cook constitutive model parameters (A, B, n, C, m, T_melt) for strain-rate sensitivity in high-speed machining. Material physics constants database.

files.name: PRISM_KDTREE.js
files.description: KD-Tree spatial partitioning data structure for nearest-neighbor queries. Used in point cloud processing and spatial lookups.

files.name: PRISM_KNOWLEDGE_INTEGRATION_TESTS.js
files.description: Integration test suite verifying knowledge base modules are loaded correctly. Test harness, not production algorithm code.

files.name: PRISM_LINALG_MIT.js
files.description: Linear algebra fundamentals: matrix multiply, transpose, determinant, inverse, LU decomposition. Foundation math used by physics and CAD modules.

files.name: PRISM_LOCAL_SEARCH.js
files.description: Local search algorithms: hill climbing (steepest ascent), random restart, tabu search, stochastic hill climbing. General optimization from MIT 6.034.

files.name: PRISM_LP_SOLVERS.js
files.description: Linear programming solvers: simplex method and potentially interior point. Used for resource allocation and scheduling optimization.

files.name: PRISM_MANUFACTURING_ALGORITHMS.js
files.description: Manufacturing-specific algorithms: cutting mechanics, chip formation, surface finish prediction. References MIT 2.008/2.810/2.830 manufacturing courses.

files.name: PRISM_MANUFACTURING_SEARCH.js
files.description: Manufacturing-specific search: tool change optimization using Weighted A*, operation sequencing. Minimizes tool changes across operations.

files.name: PRISM_MANUFACTURING_SEARCH_ENGINE.js
files.description: Manufacturing search engine: hole sequence optimization (TSP-like with A* + MST heuristic), fixture optimization. Overlapping purpose with PRISM_MANUFACTURING_SEARCH.js.

files.name: PRISM_MATH_FOUNDATIONS.js
files.description: Mathematical foundations: interval arithmetic engine (guaranteed calculation bounds), root finding, numerical integration, polynomial arithmetic. Core math infrastructure.

files.name: PRISM_MEMORY_EFFICIENT_SEARCH.js
files.description: Memory-efficient search algorithms: IDA* (Iterative Deepening A*) with O(bd) space complexity. General-purpose search from MIT 6.034.

files.name: PRISM_NUMERICAL.js
files.description: General numerical methods: root finding (Newton-Raphson, bisection), numerical differentiation, integration (Simpson, Gauss). Foundation math.

files.name: PRISM_NUMERICAL_METHODS_MIT.js
files.description: MIT-sourced numerical methods: iterative solvers, interpolation, curve fitting. Academic numerical computing implementations.

files.name: PRISM_NURBS_MIT.js
files.description: NURBS (Non-Uniform Rational B-Spline) surface evaluation: Cox-de Boor basis functions, surface point evaluation, knot insertion, degree elevation. Critical for CAD/CAM geometry.

files.name: PRISM_OCTREE.js
files.description: Octree spatial data structure for 3D spatial partitioning. Used in collision detection, point cloud processing, and stock modeling.

files.name: PRISM_ODE_SOLVERS_MIT.js
files.description: Comprehensive ODE solvers: Euler forward/backward, Runge-Kutta (RK4/RK45), Adams-Bashforth, BDF methods, adaptive step control. Used for dynamic simulation of cutting processes.

files.name: PRISM_OPTIMIZATION_ALGORITHMS.js
files.description: Gradient-based optimization: steepest descent, conjugate gradient, BFGS, L-BFGS. General optimization toolbox from MIT 6.251J/15.099.

files.name: PRISM_PHASE3_GRAPH_NEURAL.js
files.description: Graph Neural Network (GCN layers) for manufacturing feature aggregation. Phase 3 deep learning module for learning from manufacturing feature graphs.

files.name: PRISM_PHASE7_KNOWLEDGE.js
files.description: Phase 7 knowledge management system: rule engines, expert systems, manufacturing knowledge representation. Multi-source academic knowledge integration (MIT, Stanford, CMU).

files.name: PRISM_POLICY_GRADIENT_ENGINE.js
files.description: Policy gradient reinforcement learning: REINFORCE algorithm with linear policy (softmax). Used for learning cutting parameter policies.

files.name: PRISM_RL_ALGORITHMS.js
files.description: Reinforcement learning algorithms: Q-Learning, SARSA, policy gradient. 50 algorithm implementations from Stanford CS234/Berkeley CS285 for manufacturing parameter optimization.

files.name: PRISM_SEARCH_ENHANCED.js
files.description: Enhanced search algorithms: Best-First, A*, Beam Search, Bidirectional search, IDA*, SMA*, RBFS. Comprehensive AI search from MIT 6.034.

files.name: PRISM_SIGNAL_ALGORITHMS.js
files.description: Signal processing: FFT (Cooley-Tukey), digital filters, spectral analysis, windowing functions. 60 algorithms for vibration monitoring, chatter detection, sensor data processing.

files.name: PRISM_SORTING.js
files.description: Sorting algorithms: quicksort, mergesort, heapsort, radix sort, timsort. General-purpose utility algorithms.

files.name: PRISM_SPECTRAL_GRAPH_CAD.js
files.description: Spectral graph theory applied to CAD: face adjacency graph construction, spectral decomposition for mesh segmentation and feature recognition.

files.name: PRISM_SURFACE_GEOMETRY_MIT.js
files.description: Surface geometry algorithms: Gaussian/mean curvature computation, surface normal calculation, parametric surface evaluation. Critical for toolpath-on-surface generation.

files.name: PRISM_TAYLOR_ADVANCED.js
files.description: Extended Taylor tool life equation with strain rate: V*T^n*f^a*d^b=C. Computes tool life and optimizes cutting speed for target tool life. Tiny but safety-critical.

files.name: PRISM_TAYLOR_LOOKUP.js
files.description: Taylor equation constant lookup by material class. Returns default n-exponent and C-constant values for steel, aluminum, titanium, cast iron, stainless, superalloys.

files.name: PRISM_TAYLOR_TOOL_LIFE.js
files.description: Comprehensive Taylor tool life database: 150 material/tool combinations with C, n, a, b constants. Extended Taylor equation parameters for all major material classes and tool coatings.

duplicates_detected.evidence: Identical line count (2213), identical size (~75KB), identical content starting with morphSpiral toolpath generation. Only difference is 'const' declaration prefix.
duplicates_detected.recommendation: MERGE - keep COMPLETE_TOOLPATH_ALGORITHM_LIBRARY.js (has proper const declaration), retire ALGORITHM_LIBRARY.js

duplicates_detected.evidence: Both implement Dijkstra as primary algorithm. PRISM_GRAPH.js (285 lines) has generic graph ops; PRISM_GRAPH_ALGORITHMS.js (315 lines) adds CAM application context (rapid move minimization).
duplicates_detected.recommendation: MERGE - consolidate into PRISM_GRAPH_ALGORITHMS.js which has manufacturing context annotations

duplicates_detected.evidence: Both do manufacturing-specific search optimization. PRISM_MANUFACTURING_SEARCH.js (141 lines) focuses on tool change optimization via Weighted A*. PRISM_MANUFACTURING_SEARCH_ENGINE.js (148 lines) focuses on hole sequence optimization via A*+MST. Complementary but overlapping scope.
duplicates_detected.recommendation: MERGE - combine tool change and hole sequence optimization into single manufacturing search module

duplicates_detected.evidence: Both provide numerical methods (root finding, interpolation, integration). PRISM_NUMERICAL.js (185 lines) is general; PRISM_NUMERICAL_METHODS_MIT.js (167 lines) has MIT provenance. Likely overlapping implementations of Newton-Raphson, bisection, etc.
duplicates_detected.recommendation: REVIEW - compare implementations and merge, keeping MIT-attributed versions for provenance

duplicates_detected.evidence: Both relate to Taylor tool life. PRISM_TAYLOR_ADVANCED.js (51 lines) has compute functions. PRISM_TAYLOR_LOOKUP.js (45 lines) has constant lookups. PRISM_TAYLOR_TOOL_LIFE.js (98 lines) has comprehensive constant database. These three form a Taylor tool life cluster.
duplicates_detected.recommendation: MERGE - consolidate all three Taylor files into single PRISM_TAYLOR_TOOL_LIFE.js with lookup, compute, and database sections

files.name: PRISM_FORCE_LOOKUP.js
files.description: Cutting force constant (Kc) lookup by material class. Returns specific cutting force values for steel, aluminum, titanium, cast iron, stainless, superalloy. Safety-critical for force predictions.

files.name: PRISM_MATERIAL_PHYSICS.js
files.description: Material physics property lookups: density, Young's modulus, Poisson's ratio, shear modulus by material class. Constants-backed lookup against PRISM_CONSTANTS.

files.name: PRISM_MFG_PHYSICS.js
files.description: Complete cutting analysis: combined force, temperature, and wear prediction. The central manufacturing physics formula engine integrating Merchant's theory, thermal models, and tool wear.

files.name: PRISM_STANDALONE_CALCULATOR_API.js
files.description: Standalone machining calculator: RPM/SFM conversion, feed rate calculations, MRR (material removal rate), power requirements, cost estimation. User-facing calculation API.

files.name: PRISM_STRESS.js
files.description: 2D principal stress calculations: Mohr's circle, principal stresses, max shear stress, and principal angle computation. Foundational stress analysis.

files.name: PRISM_STRESS_ANALYSIS.js
files.description: Full 3D stress analysis: Von Mises equivalent stress, 3D stress tensor analysis, yield criteria. Extends PRISM_STRESS with 3D Von Mises and full tensor support.

files.name: PRISM_THERMAL_COMPENSATION.js
files.description: Kalman filter-based thermal error prediction for CNC machine compensation. Multi-sensor thermal model with state estimation for real-time thermal drift correction.

files.name: PRISM_THERMAL_LOOKUP.js
files.description: Thermal limit lookup: max cutting temperature, workpiece max temperature, and coolant requirement determination (dry/mist/flood/high-pressure) by material class.

files.name: PRISM_THERMAL_PROPERTIES.js
files.description: Thermal properties database: thermal conductivity (k), specific heat (cp), thermal expansion (alpha), max service temp for steels, aluminum, titanium, stainless, superalloys.

files.name: PRISM_TOOL_LIFE_ESTIMATOR.js
files.description: Tool life estimation using Taylor constants by material/tool combination. Provides n, C, and maxLife values for carbide/HSS/ceramic across steel, aluminum, stainless, titanium, inconel.

files.name: PRISM_TOOL_WEAR_MODELS.js
files.description: Comprehensive tool wear modeling: Extended Taylor, Archard wear model, diffusion wear, abrasive wear, adhesive wear, oxidation wear. Multi-mechanism wear prediction from MIT 2.008.

files.name: PRISM_WEAR_LOOKUP.js
files.description: Wear limit lookups: VB max by operation type (finishing, semi-finishing, roughing, heavy roughing), wear mode identification based on speed/temperature/hardness conditions.

duplicates_detected.evidence: Both compute stress analysis. PRISM_STRESS.js (138 lines) does 2D principal stresses. PRISM_STRESS_ANALYSIS.js (254 lines) does 3D Von Mises. The larger file likely subsumes the smaller.
duplicates_detected.recommendation: MERGE - consolidate into PRISM_STRESS_ANALYSIS.js which covers both 2D and 3D cases

key_findings: ALGORITHM_LIBRARY.js and COMPLETE_TOOLPATH_ALGORITHM_LIBRARY.js are byte-for-byte identical (2213 lines each) - confirmed duplicate
Three Taylor tool life files (TAYLOR_ADVANCED, TAYLOR_LOOKUP, TAYLOR_TOOL_LIFE) should be consolidated into one module
PRISM_STRESS.js is a subset of PRISM_STRESS_ANALYSIS.js - merge into one stress module
PRISM_GRAPH.js vs PRISM_GRAPH_ALGORITHMS.js both implement Dijkstra - merge with manufacturing annotations
PRISM_MANUFACTURING_SEARCH.js vs PRISM_MANUFACTURING_SEARCH_ENGINE.js have overlapping manufacturing search scope
PRISM_NUMERICAL.js vs PRISM_NUMERICAL_METHODS_MIT.js likely overlap on root finding and interpolation methods
Formula files are predominantly CRITICAL safety class (7 of 12) since they directly compute forces, temperatures, and stresses
Algorithm files are more evenly distributed: 6 CRITICAL, 14 HIGH, 17 MEDIUM, 15 LOW
Largest files: PRISM_ODE_SOLVERS_MIT.js (6386 lines), PRISM_ACO_SEQUENCER.js (5383 lines), PRISM_ALGORITHM_REGISTRY.js (3567 lines)
PRISM_KNOWLEDGE_INTEGRATION_TESTS.js is a test file, not a production algorithm - consider moving to test directory
PRISM_GRAPHICS_KERNEL_PASS.js contains malformed extraction (raw markdown with code block fences) - needs re-extraction
